name: Tiny Pirate Hunter
description:
Take command of a tiny tall-ship in search of scalliwags!

A 2D, top-down naval battle game about hunting pirates! Watch the wind and set your sails to out-maneuver your opponents, then blast away! Use gold to upgrade your ship, and beat 10 waves of buccaneers to win. Play single player or two player co-op with shared keyboard controls! Press "Esc" for volume options and such. 

Fullscreen play recommended.
